name: Rayman
description:
This script will install "Rayman" DOS CD edition for Dosbox.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: Rayman - CD DOS - DOSBOX
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/rayman.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: rayman/rayman.exe
- task:
    commands:
    - 'd:'
    - call D:\install.bat
    - exit
    drives:
      c: $GAMEDIR
      d: $GAMEDIR/CD
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/rayman_install.conf
- task:
    commands:
    - 'c:'
    - cd c:\ACCLAIM\D
    - LAURA.EXE
    - exit
    drives:
      c: $GAMEDIR
      d: $GAMEDIR/CD
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/D.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/D_install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
